content:
Yes, several members of Fleetwood Mac have spoken about how their personal relationships and dynamics have influenced their music beyond just Rumours. For example, Lindsey Buckingham has talked about how his relationship with Stevie Nicks has affected their songwriting and performances over the years. He has said that their creative collaborations were often fueled by their intense romantic relationship, as well as the ups and downs of their personal lives. Similarly, Christine McVie has discussed how her marriage and divorce from John McVie influenced her songwriting and performance, particularly on the album Rumours.

Stevie Nicks has also been open about how her relationships with both Buckingham and Mick Fleetwood influenced her music. She has described her romantic relationship with Buckingham as both a source of inspiration and conflict, while her close friendship with Fleetwood has been a creative partnership that has endured for decades.

Overall, it is clear that the dynamics between the band members have had a significant impact on their music throughout their careers.
